snippet: The Army says a Black Hawk helicopter was practicing evading enemy fire when it crashed northwest of Colorado Springs in 2015, injuring all four crew members and destroying the aircraft....

headline.main: With a Trail of Smoke, a Leisurely Flight Turned Deadly
headline.print_headline: With a Trail of Smoke, a Leisurely Flight Turned Deadly in the Hamptons

lead_paragraph: The Army says a Black Hawk helicopter was practicing evading enemy fire when it crashed northwest of Colorado Springs in 2015, injuring all four crew members and destroying the aircraft.
